title: Toy Box: Biting
description: In Curiosity by Misa Izanaki, bartender Dante wants his half-vampire lover Kale to bite him. Kale is hesitant, afraid he'll go too far and hurt his sweet lover. But will refusing his lover this request do as much damage as granting it could? Jourdan Lane's offering, Clarity, brings us back to the world of Soul Mates. In this story Caleb's punishment is coming to an end and he is finally allowed to feed again. While he'd love to begin with master vampire Lucien, it is his lover Xander he turns to.And finally, in Keifer and Me, Mike Shade brings us the reunion of Davey with his lover Kiefer after a year's separation. Keifer's promised him a homecoming Davey won't forget, but when Keifer starts talking about being a werewolf, Davey has to wonder if he's going to have to have Keifer committed. Who doesn't love it when the boys get a little toothy?
author: M. Rode
